name: Big Brother Josef
description:
You have been assigned to report capitalist spies and prevent them from stealing the secrets of the great machine. Find & click on all “Enemies of the State”. But be careful, don’t report any innocent factory workers, or you might be sent to Siberia…

Counter-Revolutionists want to blow up the great machine. Defuse their bombs before it’s too late.
Click and hold to diffuse bombs. Be quick, you don’t have much time.

If you find a vodka bottle, clicking on it will multiply your points – but you might feel a little tipsy for a few seconds. Don’t get too drunk.

Post your highscore in the comments.

Written in C# in the monogame framework.

Made by Harald and Dag.
